data.actual_result: A light line appears and vanishes.
data.expected_result: There should be no light line apparing.
data.short_description: Scrolling down in a long channel topic in light theme (for the first time) shows a white bar for a second.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a channel with an extremely long topic. - Click on the member list icon. - Switch to light theme. - Scroll down in the channel topic very fast with inertia. - Observe at the bottom of the channel topic.
